## StateApplyFunc type

A function that mutates projected state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StateApplyFunc<C extends Change = Change, T = unknown, R extends ReadModel = ReadModel> = (this: void, change: C, before: T, view: ViewSnapshotFunc<R>) => Promise<T>;
```
